
C:\Angular Apps\Angular Official Site\my-app\node_modules\uws>if not defined npm_config_node_gyp (node "C:\Mean Apps\nodejs\node_modules\npm\bin\node-gyp-bin\\..\..\node_modules\node-gyp\bin\node-gyp.js" rebuild )  else (node "" rebuild ) 
gyp info it worked if it ends with ok

gyp ERR! configure error
